text.p: In this lab exercise, you are tasked to complete the constructInitialDisplayWord() method in the Hangman class. This method constructs a masked representation (i.e. "?????") of the word to be guessed for displaying on the text box initially.

ol.li: Find out the length of the String parameter secretWord.

Create a String having the same length as secretWord by repeated concatenation of a pre-defined constant character (i.e. "?????"). The pre-defined constant character is named UNKNOWN_CHARACTER (i.e. '?').

codeparam.initial_display: // Please write your code after this line

ol.li: Returning an empty String "" or a single character '?' only.
